plot: Not everyone is the UK has the right to live with their spouse. If you are British and earning less than 18,600 Pounds, you won't be able to sponsor your partner to stay with you in the UK.
title: Visa
plot_es: Not everyone is the UK has the right to live with their spouse. If you are British and earning less than 18,600 Pounds, you won't be able to sponsor your partner to stay with you in the UK.
plot_en: Not everyone is the UK has the right to live with their spouse. If you are British and earning less than 18,600 Pounds, you won't be able to sponsor your partner to stay with you in the UK.
